bugs.title: CVE-2022-3037 vim: use after free in function qf_buf_add_line( )

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2022-3037 vim: use after free in function qf_buf_add_line( )

long_desc.thetext:
A use after free in function qf_buf_add_line( ) may cause memory corruption, that can lead to a crash or other undefined (potentially exploitable) behaviour.
